title: PVR Inox inks pact with Devyani International for development and operation of food courts in India
description: PVR Inox and QSR operator Devyani International have agreed to form a new company to develop and manage food courts in India's shopping malls. The company will invest 51:49 in its share capital, and existing food court businesses will not be part of the company until contract expiry or renewal.
